en: Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一段时期，自唐朝灭亡开始，至宋朝统一大部分汉地为止。其本质是唐朝末年藩镇割据的延续。
description.en: A period in Chinese history from the fall of the Tang dynasty to the unification of most of Han China by the Song dynasty. It was essentially a continuation of the Tang dynasty's late-period fragmentation by military governors (fanzhen).

description.zh-cn: 后梁开国君主。原为黄巢部将，后降唐，受封宣武军节度使。907年篡唐建后梁。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Liang. Originally a general under Huang Chao, he later surrendered to the Tang and was made the military governor of Xuanwu Circuit. In 907, he usurped the Tang throne and established the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 后唐开国君主，李克用之子。他灭亡后梁，建立了后唐。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Tang, son of Li Keyong. He destroyed the Later Liang and established the Later Tang.

description.zh-cn: 后晋开国君主。原为后唐河东节度使，后借契丹兵力推翻后唐，建立后晋，并割让燕云十六州。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Jin. Originally the military governor of Hedong under the Later Tang, he overthrew the Later Tang with Khitan military aid, established the Later Jin, and ceded the Sixteen Prefectures.

description.zh-cn: 后汉开国君主。原为后晋河东节度使，在契丹灭后晋后于太原称帝，收复中原。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Han. Originally the military governor of Hedong under the Later Jin, he proclaimed himself emperor in Taiyuan after the Khitans destroyed the Later Jin and subsequently recovered the Central Plains.

description.zh-cn: 后周开国君主。原为后汉枢密使，后发动兵变推翻后汉，建立后周。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Zhou. Originally the Commissioner of Military Affairs for the Later Han, he launched a coup to overthrow the Later Han and established the Later Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝开国君主。原为后周殿前都点检，通过陈桥兵变篡夺后周政权，建立宋朝，结束了五代。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Song dynasty. Originally the commander of the palace guard for the Later Zhou, he seized power through the Chen Bridge Mutiny, established the Song dynasty, and ended the Five Dynasties period.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝中后期至五代时期，地方节度使拥兵自重，不受中央控制的政治局面。
description.en: A political situation from the mid-late Tang Dynasty to the Five Dynasties period where regional military governors (jiedushi) held significant power and were not controlled by the central government.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝末年沙陀族军事将领，晋王，后唐庄宗李存勗之父，为后唐的建立奠定了基础。
description.en: A Shatuo military leader in the late Tang dynasty, Prince of Jin, and father of Emperor Zhuangzong of Later Tang (Li Cunxu). He laid the foundation for the establishment of the Later Tang.

description.zh-cn: 南唐开国君主。原为吴国权臣徐温的养子，后篡夺吴国政权，建立南唐。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Southern Tang. He was the adopted son of Xu Wen, the powerful minister of the Wu state, and later usurped the Wu throne to establish the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 后蜀开国君主。原为后唐的西川节度使，后在后唐内乱时自立为帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Later Shu. He was originally the military governor of Xichuan under the Later Tang and later declared himself emperor during the internal turmoil of the Later Tang.

description.zh-cn: 契丹国（辽朝）第二位皇帝。他接受石敬瑭的请求，助其灭亡后唐，并获得燕云十六州。后又南下灭亡后晋。
description.en: The second emperor of the Khitan Empire (Liao dynasty). He accepted Shi Jingtang's request for aid, helped destroy the Later Tang, and acquired the Sixteen Prefectures. He later marched south and destroyed the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 位于今天津、北京及河北、山西北部的十六个州，在五代时期被后晋割让给契丹，成为此后数个世纪中原王朝的国防隐患。
description.en: Sixteen prefectures located in modern-day Tianjin, Beijing, and northern Hebei and Shanxi. They were ceded to the Khitans by the Later Jin during the Five Dynasties period, becoming a major national security vulnerability for the Central Plains dynasties for centuries.

description.zh-cn: 后周第二位皇帝，郭威的养子，被誉为五代第一明君。他在位期间，对内改革，对外扩张，为北宋的统一奠定了基础。
description.en: The second emperor of the Later Zhou and the adopted son of Guo Wei. He is regarded as the most capable ruler of the Five Dynasties period. During his reign, he carried out internal reforms and external expansion, laying the foundation for the unification by the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 吴国的建立者。唐末淮南节度使，在乱世中发展割据势力，奠定了吴国的基础。
description.en: The founder of the Wu state. As the military governor of Huainan in the late Tang dynasty, he developed a regional power base amidst the chaos, laying the foundation for the Wu state.

description.zh-cn: 闽国的建立者。与其兄王潮控制福建一带，后被后梁封为闽王。
description.en: The founder of the Min kingdom. Along with his brother Wang Chao, he controlled the Fujian region and was later enfeoffed as the Prince of Min by the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 前蜀开国君主。唐末将领，后割据蜀地，于907年称帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of Former Shu. A general in the late Tang dynasty who later established control over the Shu region and declared himself emperor in 907.

description.zh-cn: 马楚的建立者。唐末将领，割据湖南，后被后梁封为楚王。
description.en: Founder of the Ma Chu state. A general in the late Tang dynasty who established control over Hunan and was later enfeoffed as the Prince of Chu by the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 南汉开国君主。继承其兄刘隐的势力，统一岭南后于917年称帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of Southern Han. He inherited the power base of his brother Liu Yin, unified the Lingnan region, and declared himself emperor in 917.

description.zh-cn: 吴越国的建立者。唐末镇海军节度使，后被后梁封为吴越王。
description.en: Founder of the Wuyue kingdom. He was the military governor of Zhenhai Circuit in the late Tang dynasty and was later enfeoffed as the Prince of Wuyue by the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 荆南（南平）的建立者。原为后梁将领，后被封为荆南节度使，于924年被后唐封为南平王。
description.en: Founder of Jingnan (Nanping). Originally a general of the Later Liang, he was made the military governor of Jingnan and was enfeoffed as the Prince of Nanping by the Later Tang in 924.

description.zh-cn: 北汉的建立者。后汉高祖刘知远之弟，在后周代汉后于太原自立为帝，延续后汉国祚，并依附辽朝。
description.en: Founder of Northern Han. He was the younger brother of Emperor Gaozu of Later Han (Liu Zhiyuan). After the Later Zhou replaced the Later Han, he established himself as emperor in Taiyuan, continuing the Later Han's imperial line and aligning with the Liao dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南唐最后一位君主，五代十国时期最重要的词人之一。
description.en: The last ruler of the Southern Tang, and one of the most important ci poets of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国是唐朝末年藩镇割据的延续。
description.en: The Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period was a continuation of the fragmentation by military governors (fanzhen) of the late Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 于907年逼迫唐哀帝禅位，灭亡唐朝。
description.en: In 907, he forced Emperor Ai of Tang to abdicate, bringing the Tang dynasty to an end.

description.zh-cn: 于907年篡唐，建立后梁。
description.en: He usurped the Tang throne in 907 and established the Later Liang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 李存勗灭后梁。
description.en: Li Cunxu destroyed the Later Liang.

description.zh-cn: 李存勗在灭亡后梁后，建国后唐。
description.en: After destroying the Later Liang, Li Cunxu founded the Later Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 石敬瑭引契丹军攻灭后唐。
description.en: Shi Jingtang led Khitan forces to destroy the Later Tang.

description.zh-cn: 石敬瑭向契丹国借兵反叛后唐。
description.en: Shi Jingtang borrowed troops from the Khitan state to rebel against the Later Tang.

description.zh-cn: 在契丹的帮助下建立后晋。
description.en: He established the Later Jin dynasty with the help of the Khitans.

description.zh-cn: 向契丹可汗耶律德光称儿皇帝。
description.en: He referred to himself as the 'son-emperor' to the Khitan khan Yelü Deguang.

description.zh-cn: 将燕云十六州割让给契丹国。
description.en: He ceded the Sixteen Prefectures to the Khitan state.

description.zh-cn: 契丹军南下灭亡后晋。
description.en: Khitan forces marched south and destroyed the Later Jin.

description.zh-cn: 在契丹灭后晋后，于太原称帝建立后汉。
description.en: After the Khitans destroyed the Later Jin, he declared himself emperor in Taiyuan and established the Later Han.

description.zh-cn: 郭威篡后汉。
description.en: Guo Wei usurped the Later Han.

description.zh-cn: 建立后周。
description.en: Established the Later Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤通过陈桥兵变篡夺后周，结束五代。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin usurped the Later Zhou through the Chen Bridge Mutiny, ending the Five Dynasties period.

description.zh-cn: 建立宋朝。
description.en: Established the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 建立吴国。
description.en: Established the Wu state.

description.zh-cn: 篡夺吴国政权。
description.en: Usurped the throne of the Wu state.

description.zh-cn: 建立南唐。
description.en: Established the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 南唐趁闽国内乱，发兵攻下建州，灭亡闽国。
description.en: Taking advantage of internal strife in Min, the Southern Tang dispatched troops, captured Jianzhou, and destroyed the Min kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 南唐趁楚国内乱之际发兵攻灭。
description.en: The Southern Tang took advantage of internal strife in Chu to send troops and destroy it.

description.zh-cn: 后周于957年发兵南征南唐，南唐战败，割让江北十四州，称臣。
description.en: In 957, the Later Zhou launched a southern campaign against the Southern Tang. The Southern Tang was defeated, ceded fourteen prefectures north of the Yangtze River, and submitted as a vassal.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝于963年并吞荆南。
description.en: The Song dynasty annexed Jingnan in 963.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝于965年派兵灭亡后蜀。
description.en: The Song dynasty sent troops to destroy the Later Shu in 965.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝于971年灭亡南汉。
description.en: The Song dynasty destroyed the Southern Han in 971.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝于975年发兵南征，灭亡南唐。
description.en: The Song dynasty launched a southern campaign in 975 and destroyed the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝于979年灭亡北汉，结束十国时期。
description.en: The Song dynasty destroyed the Northern Han in 979, ending the Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 后周世宗柴荣在位期间改革军事和内政，使得后周国力强盛，拥有统一中原的能力。
description.en: During his reign, Emperor Shizong of Later Zhou, Chai Rong, reformed the military and internal affairs, strengthening the Later Zhou and giving it the capability to unify the Central Plains.
